content.text: Are old appliances better than today 's?
content.name: 3Ovd

content.text: Today, we have many electronic appliances at home that we use everyday. They make our lives easier and comfortable. Grandparents say that objects in the past were better, but is that true?  Read the facts below and decide.
content.name: o9lb

content.text:
Appliances in the past
Refrigerators, microwaves and washers worked for about 25 years.
They were easy to repair.
They were colorful with cool designs.
A refrigerator costs one full paycheck.
Consumed a lot of energy and water.
content.name: iAxn

content.text:
Modern appliances
Refrigerators and microwaves work for about 15 years.
They can not be repaired sometimes.
Designed to weigh less.
Prices are more accessible.
They save water and energy.
